metadata.description: Claude Code plugins for productivity workflows - skills, agents, commands, and hooks

plugins.name: analyze
plugins.description: Marketplace plugin analyzer for achieving Anthropic-level quality standards through systematic DX, architecture, and capability analysis

plugins.name: blackbox
plugins.description: Zero-dependency telemetry plugin for Claude Code - captures file modifications for dataset generation and disaster recovery

plugins.name: commit
plugins.description: Git workflows: worktrees, branches, and commit organization

plugins.name: debug
plugins.description: Distributed systems debugging: log analysis, error correlation, stack trace detection, and root cause investigation

plugins.name: doc
plugins.description: Documentation: API docs, tutorials, memos, architecture guides, Mermaid diagrams

plugins.name: python
plugins.description: Modern Python 3.12+ development with uv, ruff, pydantic, FastAPI, Django and production-ready practices

plugins.name: shell
plugins.description: Shell scripting toolkit with Google Style Guide refactoring and Unix man page expertise

plugins.name: super
plugins.description: Enhanced fork of obra/superpowers (by Jesse Vincent). Adds TDD enforcement hooks, security-reviewer agent, diagram-generator agent, allowed-tools restrictions, and integration improvements. 20 proven workflow skills for Claude Code.
